idea:
With an ever growing demand for energy and an increased dependence on our limited fossil fuels we at Perinyx Energy are dedicated to creating a better and sustainable future for harnessing energy in the world. Using technology, engineering and innovation we want to bring down the carbon footprint across the energy sector by working with individuals, corporations and organizations to create energy solutions in the solar sector.

Headquartered in Mumbai, India this company was formed with the vision to create robust solutions to develop the solar sector in upcoming markets. By providing efficient and cost effective energy solutions starting from Land Acquisition, Infrastructure Development, Power Evacuation, Project EPC, Operations & Maintenance Services and Assistance with the Sale of Power, we at Perinyx Energy are your One Stop Solar Shop.

Perinyx Energy is backed by unique individuals who have spent decades in creating and running businesses across a broad spectrum of fields ranging from energy trading, infrastructure to finance.

The debate is not whether alternative energy sources can meet energy demands better than finite fossil fuels but whether we are willing to make the initiative to ensure it. At Perinyx Energy, we are here to play our part and help you play yours too.

Together we can transform the energy sector one solar panel at a time.
name: Genisys Renewable Power LLP

idea:
#Overview

TECHSTROCK is a premium Design & Development agency that focuses on Quality, Innovation & Speed. We utilized technology to bring result to grow our client Businesses. We pride ourselves in great work ethic, integrity & end-results.


#Philosophy

Our company philosophy is to create the kind of project that most business want, East to Find, Stylish & Appealing, Quick Loading, Mobile Responsive & Easy to Use.


#Mission

We’ve Design & Develop our entire process & products around providing everything a small or medium or large businesses needs when they’re starting out – ensuring that working with us is always a Quick, Easy & Hassle-Free Experience. We give our clients full control of their Project without ridiculous price tag & our friendly team offers their expertise even after your project is live.
name: Vatsal
